titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, October 20. 1648. The Committee of Estates considering how necessary it is that some orderly course be taken how the forces to be kept up within this kingdom may be entertained by the publick, with as little burthen as may be to the country ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption title and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
